state_summary: Uptime Industries introduces Lemony AI, an on-premise AI infrastructure with handheld devices that can run large language models and AI workflows.
evidence: Lemony AI can supposedly run a large language model (LLM), AI agents, and AI workflows all on one node.
Each node can sustain an LLM up to 75 billion parameters in size.
Uptime is launching with partnerships with IBM and JetBrains to provide its customers easier access to AI models.

metadata.investor_name: True Ventures, Alumni Ventures, JetBrains, and angel investors
